mapper.sql: attribute_id AS "attributeId", attribute AS "attribute", item_id AS "itemId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", sort AS "sort", attribute_values_id AS "attributeValuesId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_item_attribute where 1 = 1
and attribute_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.attributeId},'%')
and attribute like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.attribute},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
